channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets

item.description: @shutupzac96 If only the Pixel 6a had wireless charging. USB+C charging ports have failed on several phones.

item.title: AI-viz the emerging generative art field produces interesting images. https://t.co/NeNWsm9GBt

item.description:
Shall we use #AI-viz hash tag for this type of post, or is #AI-vizualization better? I prefer the shorter tag...
#DalleMini #StableDiffusion are more specific

@hardmaru https://t.co/8fJBMzMDH4

What's a good Twitter tag for this fascinating work? Pretty sure this will be a Big Deal.

Note: this is NOT my expertise, so I may be lost in space. Or not.ðŸŒž

@marccanter4real @antoniogm @BrianRoemmele https://t.co/jtdW6YCRbf

Re-upping because (I think ..) this is an important development. On Twitter, the time of day (among other factors) affects who sees a tweet.

@lasersailor @MikyDe @russsharer @antoniogm https://t.co/3A0p1sX5go
item.source:markdown:
Re-upping because (I think ..) this is an important development. On Twitter, the time of day (among other factors) affects who sees a tweet.
@lasersailor @MikyDe @russsharer @antoniogm https://t.co/3A0p1sX5go

item.description: @f_fz @EliotJacobson Interesting that you looked at my Twitter likes (I think?). Interesting technique that I haven't used. I will say Twitter algos do a reasonably solid job when recommending people to follow. Easily an 80 percent chance Twitter suggests people I might find interesting.
item.source:markdown: @f_fz @EliotJacobson Interesting that you looked at my Twitter likes (I think?). Interesting technique that I haven't used. I will say Twitter algos do a reasonably solid job when recommending people to follow. Easily an 80 percent chance Twitter suggests people I might find interesting.

item.description:
As AI movie creation technology matures, we will see a tsunami of synthesized video content, some brilliant (some dreadful), created by any of the billions of people who have internet access.

Is this a Guttenberg class inflection point?

@mims @stevesi @adamcurry https://t.co/w8IYaLKmS5
THIS is who we are. https://t.co/8aiK1rfDMb
item.source:markdown: THIS is who we are. https://t.co/8aiK1rfDMb
